name: sokoban-sokoban
description:
Somebody messed up the graveyard! You can fix it, but your movements are joined together.

More specifically, the location of the gravestones in the level's movement table determines which movements are joined to which. When two movements are "joined", the associated input performs BOTH movements!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Z: Undo

R: Restart

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam: Joined Together. We used Rust + Bevy for the language/engine.

Authors: Trouv, Goobysnax

View the source code here: https://github.com/Trouv/sokoban-sokoban

To run on linux, you may or may not need some of these bevy dependencies: https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/blob/main/docs/linux_dependencies.md
